item.content:encoded:
Startup Weekend is a global network of passionate leaders and entrepreneurs on a mission to inspire, educate, and empower individuals, teams and communities. And when they say global, they really mean it! There are Startup Weekends in Germany, France, Poland, Malasya, China, Uruguay, USA and many other countries, incluing Brazil.

It is the time and place where developers, designers, product managers and startup enthusiasts gather to build products and launch startups.Â And now, it is SÃ£o Paulo’s turn!

The ‘paulista’ edition will be hosted at ESPM in the next weekend (November 18th, 19th and 20th) and we will be there too.Â Don’t miss thisÂ opportunity. Bring your ideas and coding skills. Let’s share experiences and meet otherÂ entrepreneurs.

Watch the video below or take a look intoÂ http://saopaulo.startupweekend.org/Â for more information.

The post Join other entrepreneurs! Startup Weekend is back to SÃ£o Paulo first appeared on Plataformatec Blog.
